import request from'../utils/request';//请求逻辑实例化
var Book={getList:function getList(params){var data=request.get('/book/list',params).then(function(response){return response;});return data;},openBook:function openBook(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var data=request.get("/_api2/read/openBook",params).then(function(response){return response;});return data;}};export default Book;
